about_the_game:
DESCEND INTO DARKNESS


Embark on a spine-chilling horror-survival shooting experience unlike any other.
Join Jaxon Blair as he ventures into the sinister depths of Dr. Gloom's laboratory.
Uncover the secrets hidden in every corner, and face unimaginable horrors lurking in the shadows.

UNLEASH THE MADNESS


Immerse yourself in stunning, lifelike graphics that breathe life into the eerie atmosphere with chilling authenticity.
Prepare for pulse-pounding first-person action as you navigate labyrinthine corridors, facing off against grotesque mutants and uncovering dark secrets hidden within.
Crafted by a single visionary developer using Unreal Engine 5, this game is a testament to passion, creativity, and determination.

A TWISTED NARRATIVE


With its captivating narrative and immersive gameplay, this solo-developed masterpiece will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.
Are you ready to confront your fears and uncover the truth lurking in the shadows, armed with only limited supplies?

EMBRACE THE UNKNOWN


Experience the horror, survive the madness, and emerge victorious.
Join me on this thrilling journey through my debut indie project, where every scream, every heart-stopping moment is a testament to the passion and dedication poured into my first game.
The darkness awaits, are you prepared to face it?

content_descriptors.notes: "Prepare to encounter blood, bones, and body bags in the depths of Dr. Gloom's laboratory. Your journey will be fraught with the remnants of failed experiments and the twisted forms of mutated creatures. Enter with caution, for every corner may hold a new horror to face."

legal_notice:
All assets used in this game have been sourced from royalty-free libraries or created by the developer. However, if any assets are found to be non-royalty-free, please report them to the developer for immediate removal.

Additionally, all names used in the game are randomly generated, and any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.

For further information or to report concerns regarding copyrighted material or name similarities, please contact the developer directly.

By playing this game, you agree to abide by these terms. Please note that additional terms of service and a privacy policy may be provided in the future.
